notesStmt.note: Tidemarks and stains at edges. Infilled losses. Rodent damage at foot of first gathering.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 14th to 15th century. Italian semi-cursive script of the 14th to 15th century. Italian semi-cursive script of the 15th century. binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Isaac Ibn Latif. Ginze Ham-Melekh. Etc. A.D. 1403. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1084.'
